locations: Santa Clarita, California, USA::(Party People Headquarters)
imdb.plot outline: Party People, a prominent Southern California children's party entertainment company, is hiring, and Jack and Vanessa need to make some quick cash. Little do they know, they're about to be pulled into a strange and hilarious world where grown adults dress in costume and parents will do anything to make sure their kids have the best birthdays ever!
imdb.title: Party People
plot: A comedic behind-the-scenes look at the world of children's party entertainment.::Anonymous

_Party People_ (qv), a prominent Southern California children's party entertainment company, is hiring, and Jack and Vanessa need to make some quick cash. Little do they know, they're about to be pulled into a strange and hilarious world where grown adults dress in costume and parents will do anything to make sure their kids have the best birthdays ever!::Anonymous
